sentences.sContent: a job in which a variety of professional skills will be deployed
sentences.sCn: 要用到多项专业技术的工作

remMethod.val: de(表加强) + ploy(策略) → 运用策略 → 使用， 运用

trans.tranCn: 部署； 使用， 运用
trans.tranOther: to organize or move soldiers, military equipment etc so that they are in the right place and ready to be used
